Need a light dessert that is refreshing, good for you and delicious?

Each serving of this refreshing granita provides a full serving of fruit*, and is made by blending V8 V-Fusion Pomegranate Blueberry with fresh berries, honey and lemon, then freezing the mixture, stirring occasionally to create a wonderful texture.

Blueberry Pomegranate Granita

Prep: 10 minutes
Chill: 5 hours 30 minutes
Serves: 6
Ingredients:

4 cups V8 V-Fusion® Pomegranate Blueberry Juice
2 cups fresh blueberries and/or strawberries
2 tbsp. honey
2 tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:

Place the juice, blueberries, honey and lemon juice into a blender container. Cover and blend until they're smooth. Pour the mixture into an 11 x 7-inch baking pan. Cover the pan tightly with plastic wrap.

Freeze for 45 minutes or until the edges of the mixture become icy. Stir the mixture with a whisk. Cover and freeze for 45 minutes. Stir the mixture again with the whisk.

Cover the pan and freeze for 3 hours or until the mixture is frozen solid.

Scrape the frozen mixture with a fork to form icy flakes. Cover and freeze for 1 hour.

Spoon the granita into goblets or parfait glasses. Garnish with mint leaves and serve with additional fresh fruit.

NUTRITION INFO*

Nutritional Values per Serving using V8 Fusion Pomegranate Blueberry: Calories 117, Total Fat 0g, Saturated Fat 0g, Cholesterol 0mg, Sodium 22mg, Total Carbohydrate 30g, Dietary Fiber 1g, Protein 0g, Vitamin A 11%DV, Vitamin C 77%DV, Calcium 2%DV, Iron 2%DV

* % Daily Values (DV) are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.
